SourceBufferRemoveAsync.summary:
The removeAsync() method of the
interface starts the process of asynchronously removing
from the SourceBuffer media segments found within a specific time
range. A is returned, which is fulfilled when the buffers
in the specified time range have been removed.

remarks.para:
This method can only be called when is
false. If that's not the case, call {{domxref("SourceBuffer.abort",
"abort()")}} instead.

SourceBufferRemoveAsync.returns:
A whose fulfillment handler is executed once the buffers in the
specified time range have been removed from the SourceBuffer.
